GSD.product_version: versions from v5.12 to before v5.15.33
GSD.description:
crypto: octeontx2 - remove CONFIG_DM_CRYPT check

This is an automated ID intended to aid in discovery of potential security vulnerabilities. The actual impact and attack plausibility have not yet been proven.
This ID is fixed in Linux Kernel version v5.15.33 by commit e6374086f249295121384bfaa7cdcc8d461146f0, it was introduced in version v5.12 by commit 6f03f0e8b6c8a82d8e740ff3a87ed407ad423243. For more details please see the references link.
